text: Hagi Peka'ma Israeli vahe kinima mani'nea knafi, Asiriati kini ne' Tiglat Pilesa'a ha' eme huzmanteno Ijoni kuma'ma, Abel-Betmaka kuma'ma, Janoa kuma'ma, Kadesi kuma'ene, Hazori kuma'enena e'nerino Giliati kazigane Galili kaziganena enerino, ana maka Neftali naga'mofo mopanena erivagare'ne. Ana nehuno ana kumatmimpi vahetmina zamavareno Asiria mopare ome kina huzmante'ne.
